EKIZ.IS.long_name: Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
EKIZ.IS.summary: Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the production and sale of olive oil products in Egypt. The company provides natural extra virgin, natural first, organic extra virgin, and refined olive oil, as well as Riviera olive oil. It offers its products under the Belluti, Dona Elena, Healthy You, and Kantarli brand names. The company was formerly known as Ekiz Yag ve Sabun Sanayii A.S. and changed its name to Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in September 2014. Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1946 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

IZFAS.IS.long_name: Izmir Firça Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
IZFAS.IS.summary: Izmir FirÃ§a Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi produces and sells various cleaning and painting brushes in Turkey and internationally. The company offers hand tools, brushes, rollers, mops, and squeegees for cleaning fields; and custom brushes for industries. It also provides construction products; and PET-PVC synthetic monofilaments fibers for brushes and brooms. The company is based in Izmir, Turkey.

SANFM.IS.long_name: Sanifoam Sünger Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
SANFM.IS.summary: Sanifoam SÃ¼nger Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides insulation and cleaning products. It offers firex, polyester felt, melamine sponge, bondex, and flame retardant polyurethane sponge insulation products. The company also provides cleaning products, such as scrubber sponges, scouring balls and fibers, cleaning cloths, and bath and other sponges; detergents and personal care products; and raw-materials and semi-finished products. Its products are used in automotive, household appliance, sound insulation and acoustic arrangement, industrial insulation, and technical applications. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

VKING.IS.summary: Viking Kagit ve SelÃ¼loz A.S. produces and sells papers for the cleaning paper industry in Turkey. The company offers toilet papers, paper towels, napkins, facial tissues, wet towels, dispensers, and other products under the Premia, Lily, Senso, Select, and Pufla brands. It also exports its products to 23 countries, primarily to the Europe and Central Asian Republics. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Viking Kagit ve SelÃ¼loz A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.
